definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The reducing annealing furnace is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 採用無氧化還原退火爐。

sentences.english: The little country schoolhouse was heated by an old-fashioned , pot - bellied stove.
sentences.chinese: 那所小小的鄉村小學依靠一箇舊式的圓肚火爐取暖。

sentences.english: Tom was sitting near the fire when he heared a knock located on the door.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆正坐在火爐邊，這時他聽到一陣敲門聲。

sentences.english: He kept his seat, and shrank closer to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他還坐着，向火爐那邊更挨近些。

sentences.english: At present, hot-air circulation annealing lehrs is the most advanced glass annealing device.
sentences.chinese: 熱風循環退火爐是目前最先進的玻璃製品退火設備。

sentences.english: The chamber was lighted by the fire on the hearth and the twilight falling through the window.
sentences.chinese: 房間利用火爐的光和從窗子透進來的黃昏天色來照明。

sentences.english: She kept looking out of the window, suffused with the warmth from the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她目不轉睛地望着窗外，身上洋溢着火爐的熱意。

sentences.english: She is settled at ease by the fire, reading her newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 她舒坦地安坐在火爐邊，讀着報。

sentences.english: Moved the lamp closer to get better light.
sentences.chinese: 他把椅子移得更靠近火爐。

sentences.english: Cars and houses, bearskin rugs to lie before my fire.
sentences.chinese: 車子，房子，還有火爐旁的熊皮地毯。
看來今天又熱得像火爐了。

sentences.english: The gas flow rate is one of the key design parameters for HPH furnace.
sentences.chinese: 循環風量是全氫罩式退火爐的關鍵設計參數之一。

sentences.english: Surely the day is coming; it will burn like a furnace.
sentences.chinese: 萬軍之耶和華說，那日臨近，勢如燒着的火爐。

sentences.english: He sat by the fire, devouring beef and onions.
sentences.chinese: 坐火爐旁，狼吞嚥喫着牛肉蔥。

sentences.english: The cat basks before the fire.
One small fire in the kitchen will cover the whole house in soot.
sentences.chinese: 一個廚房裏的小火爐就會把整個房子都燻黑。
